message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant premium over its intrinsic value to you, which is $800,000, and I believe it presents an excellent investment opportunity for you. I trust that you will appreciate the unique qualities and potential benefits of this product, making it a worthwhile addition to your collection or business. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this transaction.
